1501070.name: Killer Gin Soundtrack
1501070.description:
Killer Gin is an epic fantasy RPG with 50+ hrs of gameplay!

This is the original 5 song soundtrack for KG.

You will get all 5 tracks in both mp3 and wav format.

An anime style opener, atmospheric tracks, and a couple tracks with vocals are included.

Artist: Jack Alack, Original songs created for Killer Gin.

BONUS: You will also receive 3 unique pictures in both medium and high (1280 by 720) quality formats.

Artist: Andy Bayo, Artist for the Killer Gin RPG and Manga.

(Once the music is downloaded, it will be located in your STEAM Music folder, Apps are in the STEAM Common Folder, Music is in the Music Folder)
